sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均有"不幸的"之意。
means: unhappy ： 多用于表示心理状态，指由于不满意或遇到一般性倒霉事而感到不愉快。
unfortunate ： 语气较强，多指因命运不佳，意外不幸或事业失败、生活处于困境等而感到不幸。
unlucky ： 指因缺少或一时无机遇，虽作了努力，但事不从心，感到失意。
disastrous ： 着重不可避免和后果严重。

sentence.Network_en: The first four years of government were completely disastrous.
sentence.Network_cn: 政府前4年的执政彻底失败。

sentence.Network_en: The effect on coffee prices has been disastrous for the producers.
sentence.Network_cn: 对咖啡价格的影响对生产商而言是灾难性的。

sentence.Network_en: Obree summed his weekend up in one word: "Disastrous."
sentence.Network_cn: 奥布瑞用一个词总结了他的周末经历：“灾难。”

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词汇的奥秘 ... pompous 壮丽的 disastrous 灾难性的 fireproof 防火的.
灾难性大难临头彻底失败disastrous 灾难性disastrously
文都考研词汇词根（1-1000） - 豆丁网 ... disaster 灾难, 天灾, 灾祸 disastrous 损失惨重的, 悲伤的 augment 增加, 增大 n.增加.
2012年中考英语高频词汇_百度文库 ... disappoint v. 使……失望 disastrous a. 灾难性的,悲惨的 discover vt. 发现,暴露,显示.

list.abs: disaster 灾难disastrous accident 灾难性事故disastrous 灾难性的
事变 English,... ... 不变 constant;unvarying; 惨变 tragic event;disastrous turn 程序层级变数 procedure-level variable.
disastershutdown 事故停车disastrous wave 海啸disavantage 不利条件
disastrous attacks(灾难性的袭击), express condolence to somebody(向某人表示哀悼) Chinese.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (in the sense 'ill-fated'): from French désastreux, from Italian disastroso, from disastro 'disaster'

entry.def: A disastrous event has extremely bad consequences and effects.

example.ex: The effect on coffee prices has been disastrous for the producers.
example.tran: 对咖啡价格的影响对生产商而言是灾难性的。

entry.def: If you describe something as disastrous, you mean that it was very unsuccessful.

example.ex: England's cricketers have had another disastrous day.
example.tran: 英格兰板球队又经历了灰色的一天。

example.ex: ...their disastrous performance in the general election of 1906.
example.tran: 他们在1906大选中的糟糕表现

means.word_mean: 1. (of events) having extremely unfortunate or dire consequences; bringing ruin;

sentences.sentence: "the stock market crashed on Black Friday"
"the battle was a disastrous end to a disastrous campaign"
"such doctrines, if true, would be absolutely fatal to my theory"- Charles Darwin
"it is fatal to enter any war without the will to win it"- Douglas MacArthur

auth_sentence.content: In the wrong hands, it could be disastrous.
auth_sentence.res_content: In the wrong hands, it could be disastrous.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In the wrong hands, it could be disastrous.

auth_sentence.content: So for Russia, it would be pretty disastrous.
auth_sentence.res_content: So for Russia, it would be pretty disastrous.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So for Russia, it would be pretty disastrous.

auth_sentence.content: Would it have been as disastrous as some believe?
auth_sentence.res_content: Would it have been as disastrous as some believe?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Would it have been as disastrous as some believe?

stems_affixes.word_buile: dis不,坏+aster星→星位不正,表示有灾难

means.word_mean: 灾难性的, 造成灾害的

sentences.en: Carelessness in driving often results in disastrous accidents.
sentences.cn: 驾驶不慎常带来不幸的意外。

jushi.english: Carelessness in driving often results in disastrous accidents.
jushi.chinese: 驾驶不慎常带来不幸的事故。
